page.title: 02Description of Goonhavern
page.content: I live in the village of Goonhavern.In Goonhavern there are two shops,a post office and a cafe.The cafe is called the Forge Cafe,it is called that because it was once a forge. The close I live in is called Rose Meadows.There are lots of people living in the close,like my next door neighbour,James,Matthew and Andrew Frith and their mum and dad. In the village there is also a pottery.The pottery is on a corner not far from the close,and I can just see it from my bedroom window. Behind us there is a caravan site,but it is only used as a caravan site in the summer.In the winter it is usually used for keeping animals in. At the moment they have got three goats,a young one and two older ones,the two older ones are going to have babies soon.
